Chaos Ch1
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Epics In Progress, Section III: Chaos Ch1
By Waddafxup 101 on Thursday, August 10, 2006 - 12:48 pm:

Screams of mosters and man were heard as the Raiden waited nervously.

"Can I beat him?How strong is he,or is he good in INT?Am I ready for this?"all these things raced in his mind as a man ,no older than 18,called his name.
It was his master,Chris.

"Judo!"Chris exlaimed."It's time!"

"Huh?"The Raiden asked.

"Get out there,Judo!"Chris told him as pushing him outside.The sun glazed down on him as he slowly stepped onto the ring to finally meet his opponent. He laughed at the sight of his enemy.It was a Cute little Eared Mew(Mew/Hare).It was just sitting there licking it's tail .
"You're my opponent?"Judo laughed."Heh" The Mew said nothing. "You can't talk,how sad.Hahahah!"Judo mocked. The Mew still continue to lick.

"Ready...Fight!"The anouncer yelled.
It then pounced on Judo.As the claws dug deeper,he heard Chris yelling at him.He found the strength to finally pull it off him.Judo then pounced in the air,and plow kicked it.
As the Mew tried to get up,gunfire was heard.
The Mew had been shot.The stadium became silent as the Mew Fell to the ground...

This was the begining of Judo's Quest to learn not to take forgrantted his most precious item,his life.
